"<br>『エクストリームクエスト』Ｅトライアルについて<br>": "『エクストリームクエスト』Ｅトライアルについて"

"This will explain the special Priority Orders.

During 'Extreme Quests' we will create difficult mock Priority Orders.

*During these orders, all recovery effects towards players decrease by a certain percent. However, the recovery effects when reviving someone are not lowered."
